titleStmt.title: Corpus sine capite visibili, an Ã¦nigmaticall emblem, or, a modell of these distemper'd times being an apparent body, well proportioned, upright and streight, but yet without any visible head, in this our most unhappy mereridian [sic] of London, lately conceived in a dreame or slumber, and now delineated, penned and produced, to the open view of the world / by I.M., Student of Exon. in Oxon.
titleStmt.author: I. M., Student of Exon. in Oxon.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
